notes: [Improved] Updated Algolia SDK
[Improved] Updated for Top Shelf Craft transition.
[Fixed] Fixed a compatibility issue with the latest release of Craft. Removed depreciated usage of CRAFT_BUILD, TRACK, VERSION.
[Fixed] Fixed a bug where a check on supported element ids would cause an entry save event to fail
[Improved] Updated how the internal License state is stored to fix an intermittent bug on some installs.

[Improved] Updated the handling of Commerce product variants to more fully map them as part of the default mapping. Variants are now included in a variants array, and the default variant also in a defaultVariant item.
[Fixed] Fixed a bug in Commerce's event triggering that passed old or empty data on a products default price, sku when an item was saved the first time.
[Fixed] Fixed a bug where variant updates after a purchase wouldn't trigger an index update with the available quantity update.
[Fixed] Fixed the free item population limit which should have been set to 250 items per index.
[Fixed] Fixed a bug where valid license keys were being marked as invalid during the license checks.
[Improved] Updated the population transfer to be less memory intensive to bypass memory issues on low memory servers, with large size individual items.
[Improved] Updated the bundled composer libraries.
[Fixed] Fixed a bug where mapping nested elements that hit the max map depth would cause the parent item to be marked invalid because we were not resetting our depth counter properly.
[Fixed] Fixed a license check issue that would cause a valid license to sometimes fail to properly set the right state.
[Fixed] Fixed up the mapping system to explicitly clear out any left over mapped, but failed items when starting a new population task.
[Fixed] Fixed an issue where some non-entry elements would report themselves as entries during a delete action, and would incorrectly trigger a delete action from the indexes.
[Fixed] Fixed an issue where url history pop states would trigger on the first load even when the search on load false was passed
[Fixed] Fixed a bug where Matrix fields weren't being fully parsed in the basic mapping
[Fixed] Fixed a bug where Shortlist item updates would erroneously trigger an entry updated event
[Fixed] Fixed a bug where the basic mapping could thrown an error when triggered with bad keys. Failures are now caught and skipped where possible.
[Improved] Updated the versions of some internal search libraries
[New] New - search plus now supports commerce products!
[Added] Added a new searchPlus_alterBasicItemMapping hook to help developers alter the basic mapping output
[Added] Add support for mapping of asset transforms. Now all possible transforms are included on the mapped assets and accessible in your templates
[Added] Added support for simple faceting setup when using the searchplus.js helper
[Improved] Updated how the basic mapping maps content. Now neatly handles all sorts of field content, including relationships
[Improved] Updated how the content population runs to use a new 3 step process of collection, mapping and upload which uses the Craft background tasks and massively improves performance
[Fixed] Fixed a bug where mapping a user with content that's been deleted would throw an error
[Fixed] Fixed a mapping issue where content using matrixes as the sole source of content would sometimes fail
[Fixed] Fixed an issue where content wouldn't be properly mapped if the item was in a draft state
[Fixed] Fixed a bug where bulk item actions to change statuses wouldn't be properly triggering item updates
[Fixed] Fixed a handful of UI inconsistencies in the edit views
[Fixed] Fixed a bug that would prevent the index settings from being edited if the content map had changed
[Fixed] Fixed an issue that prevented users from renaming index handles
[Improved] Updated handling of lightswitch and number fields on mapping. Now maps to bool and floats respectively to allow better behaviours with Algolia filters
[Improved] Updated licence check logic. License checks now only occur every 24 hours at maximum while in the CP.
[Fixed] Fixed a bug that would cause some entries to fail to save with a php error if the postDate wasn't set to a real date
[Fixed] Fixed a bug where entry statues updated in bulk wouldn't trigger a resync of the content state in the indexes
[New] New! Search Plus 1.0 has landed
[Added] Added internal licensing and update handling
[Fixed] Fixed an issue where index counts would appear off for some locale setups
[Fixed] Fixed some issues that would cause mappings to fail with some unusual entry format setups
[Added] Fixed lots of niggles for the 1.0 release
[Improved] Updated lots of internal handling
[Added] Added handling for external indexes
[Added] Added more front-end handling
[Fixed] Fixed issues relating to multi-indexes
[Improved] Updated the handling of batch element actions for better delete, update behaviour from the element index views
[Improved] Added lots of new things in prep for 1.0
[Added] Added new additional support for third party mapping
[Fixed] Fixed an issue with population hangs on some edge case setups
[Fixed] Fixed an issue with the edition handling code
[Fixed] Fixed an issue related to third party mappings and validation of the return data
[New] New - added full support for multiple Entry sections in the same index
[Added] Added the base for generic element handling
[Improved] Updated the population handling logic to allow generic handling of elements with better fallbacks
[Added] Added early stage multiuenviroment handling
[Added] Added support for alternative mapping test views in the admin area
[Added] Added early support for upcoming edition levels
[Fixed] Fixed a load of population bugs
[Fixed] Fixed an issue where failed mappings would prevent an item from properly saving
[Added] Added Breadcrumbs throughout the CP views and fixed some minor view inconsistencies.
[Added] Added early test Edition handling. Not currently hooked up or required during the beta.
[Fixed] Fixed an issue where Algolia settings were not being properly saved when used without a direct config option.
[Fixed] Fixed an issue where correct Algolia settings were not being validated properly on the first pass.
[Beta] Beta - first private Beta release
[New] New - Plugin Icons for Craft 2.5 support
[New] New - Combined JS library for single line JS usage
[Added] Added the Ability to preview and test mappings within the Settings pages
[Added] Added an install check for php versions
[Improved] Updated with overall settings update for Craft 2.5
[Improved] Updated lots and lots of things
